direction-type.words: Bars 1-4, guide tone line: A, G#, G (passing F), E
Bars 5-6: guide tone line F, F#, G
Bars 9-12: guide tone line (F#, F, E, Eb)
Also, common C Ionian scale in bars 10-11
Bars 17-20, Guide tone line: B, Bb, A, Ab, G, F#, F
Bar 21-23: common scale C Ionian, also 21-22: pedal on G
23-24 (and then 1-4 of next chorus) Guide tone line: C/B/Bb (A, G#, G..)
Bars 7-8: Common scale: C ionian Also, V-I resolution
